body.p: Silicon Valley in California is an important place in computing. Why is the word silicon in Silicon Valley?

multiple_choice.choice: Silicon is a naturally soft and rubbery substance.
Silicon is a key element in dilithium crystals that are used in making chips.
Silicon is used to make chips containing millions of transistors.
Silicon is used to make fast hard drives.

response.feedback: Silcone is the soft rubbery substance, not silicon.
Silicon is used in making chips. However, dilithium is a fictional chemical element from the TV show Star Trek.
Silicon chips containing transistors are a key building block of computers.
The key part of a hard drive is a magnetic platter, not silicon.
